MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 and WA10 postcode areas of St Helens affecting properties in a widespread area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:48 am following a request from emergency services regarding an issue at a substation.  Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:00 pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35 am on 22nd January, 2021.
